entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
